title: Who are all the F1 rookies driving in FP1 in 2025?
summary: This season, every F1 team must give multiple rookies time behind the wheel during Friday practice sessions. Here's a look at all the drivers

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of allowing rookies to drive during Friday practice sessions in F1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: To give them experience and familiarize them with the car and circuit.
wrong_options: To evaluate team strategies for the race
To determine the starting grid for the race

qa_pairs.question: In what year did the regulation requiring F1 teams to give rookies time during Friday practice sessions come into effect?
Which of the following teams is required to allow rookies to participate in FP1 sessions?
